About Me

Land, air and sea. Vehicles are everywhere. We take our surroundings for granted but never thoroughly think about how such machines came to be and how they benefit society. I wondered how these vehicles ever worked in the first place. My interest in this field drives me to discover and teach more people about the technologiesâ€™ effectiveness and impact.
